original_solution_mapping.L1: Ryan read an average of 300 pages a day because 2100 / 7 = <<2100/7=300>>300
original_solution_mapping.L2: He read 100 more pages a day on average than his brother because 300 - 200 = <<300-200=100>>100

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5827.
    Returns: the average number of more pages Ryan read per day compared to his brother.
    """
    # L1
    total_pages_ryan = 2100 # a total of 2100 pages
    days_in_a_week = 7 # finished them in a week
    ryan_avg_pages_per_day = total_pages_ryan / days_in_a_week

    # L2
    brother_pages_per_day = 200 # 200 pages each
    ryan_more_pages_per_day = ryan_avg_pages_per_day - brother_pages_per_day

    # FA
    answer = ryan_more_pages_per_day
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Ryan read an average of {ryan_avg_pages_per_day} pages a day because {total_pages_ryan} / {days_in_a_week} = <<{total_pages_ryan}/{days_in_a_week}={ryan_avg_pages_per_day}>>{ryan_avg_pages_per_day}

He read {ryan_more_pages_per_day} more pages a day on average than his brother because {ryan_avg_pages_per_day} - {brother_pages_per_day} = <<{ryan_avg_pages_per_day}-{brother_pages_per_day}={ryan_more_pages_per_day}>>{ryan_more_pages_per_day}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Ryan read an average of 300 pages a day because 2100 / 7 = <<2100/7=300>>300
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: He read 293 more pages a day on average than his brother because 300 - 7 = <<300-7=293>>293

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'days_in_a_week' (7) was used instead of 'brother_pages_per_day' (200).
